Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.base.Controller
      • client.map.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Controller
implements IMapController
    Implementation for the map controller

      • initFromModel

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        Description copied from interface: IMapController
        This method is called whenever the user is trying to place a road on the map. It is called by the view for each "mouse move" event. The returned value tells the view whether or not to allow the road to be placed at the specified location.
        Specified by:
        canPlaceRoad in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - The proposed road location
        Returns:
        true if the road can be placed at edgeLoc, false otherwise

      • canPlaceSettlement

        Specified by:
        canPlaceSettlement in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - The proposed settlement location
        Returns:

      • startMove

        public void startMove(PieceType pieceType,
             boolean isFree,
             boolean allowDisconnected)
        Description copied from interface: IMapController
        This method is called when the user requests to place a piece on the map (road, city, or settlement)
        Specified by:
        startMove in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        pieceType - The type of piece to be placed
        isFree - true if the piece should not cost the player resources, false otherwise. Set to true during initial setup and when a road building card is played.
        allowDisconnected - true if the piece can be disconnected, false otherwise. Set to true only during initial setup.

      • cancelMove

        public void cancelMove()
        Description copied from interface: IMapController
        This method is called from the modal map overlay when the cancel button is pressed.
        Specified by:
        cancelMove in interface IMapController

      • playSoldierCard

        public void playSoldierCard()
        Description copied from interface: IMapController
        This method is called when the user plays a "soldier" development card. It should initiate robber placement.
        Specified by:
        playSoldierCard in interface IMapController

      • playRoadBuildingCard

        public void playRoadBuildingCard()
        Description copied from interface: IMapController
        This method is called when the user plays a "road building" progress development card. It should initiate the process of allowing the player to place two roads.
        Specified by:
        playRoadBuildingCard in interface IMapController

      • robPlayer

        public void robPlayer(RobPlayerInfo victim)

        This method is called by the Rob View when a player to rob is selected via a button click.
        Specified by:
        robPlayer in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        victim - The player to be robbed
